backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a production tracking system with user profiles, production entries, dispatch records, daily reports, and master order status; includes authorization mixin, migration support, and CRUD operations for 17 manufacturing operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that adds new daily production report entries for date 2026-02-21 across all 17 operations with updated production metrics during canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features: automatic dashboard refresh after batch insertion and LiveProductionTable display of all 17 operations for date 2026-02-21.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summaries of all frontend components, pages, and configuration files including routing, hooks, forms, tables, and styling with admin authorization patterns.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with base layer defining CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space for industrial UI styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font from Google Fonts and mounting React app at root div with module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component with TanStack Router setup defining 8 routes (dashboard, production entry, dispatch tracking, etc.), protected layout with authentication check, profile setup modal, and dark theme provider.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied UI component displaying shield alert icon and logout button for users without admin permissions to perform restricted actions.
frontend/src/components/CircularProgress: Displays an animated circular progress indicator with percentage, showing produced, target, and remaining values in a glassmorphic card.
frontend/src/components/DailyProductionR: Form component for submitting daily production reports with single or batch mode for multiple operations (Boxing, Welding, etc.), including master order status updates.
Displays a table of daily production reports filtered by date, showing operation names, today's production, total completed, dispatched, and in-hand quantities.
Reusable date range filter component with start and end date inputs for filtering data within a specified time period.
frontend/src/components/DispatchEntryFor: Form for creating new dispatch entries with container type, quantity, dispatch date, destination, and delivery status fields.
frontend/src/components/DispatchHistoryT: Displays dispatch history in a table with container type, quantity, destination, date, and status; includes admin-only status update functionality via dialog.
frontend/src/components/EditProductionRe: A dialog component for editing daily production reports with form validation for today's production, total completed, dispatched, and calculated in-hand values. Uses mutation hooks to update production history entries and displays read-only date and operation fields.
frontend/src/components/HistoricalOpenin: Displays a locked historical opening balance entry showing manufacturing start date, system go-live date, and pre-system production metrics (manufactured and dispatched quantities). Renders a read-only card with formatted dates and production statistics.

Admin-only form for creating a one-time historical opening balance entry with fixed values (344 units manufactured/dispatched, dates from Aug 2025 to Feb 2026). Shows warning that the entry cannot be edited after saving.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout with collapsible sidebar navigation, displaying 7 main routes (Dashboard, Daily Entry, Dispatch, Production History, Opening Balance, Monthly Target, Settings). Includes user profile display, admin badge, and login button in header.
frontend/src/components/LiveProductionTa: Displays a table of daily production reports for all 17 operations in a fixed order, showing today's production, total completed, dispatched, and in-hand quantities. Renders placeholder rows for operations without data.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Authentication button component that toggles between login and logout states using Internet Identity. Handles authentication flow, clears query cache on logout, and displays loading state during authentication.
frontend/src/components/MasterOrderProgr: Displays master order progress with circular progress chart, summary cards for manufactured/dispatched/remaining units, and handles loading/error states. Includes real-time refetch indicator and completion badges.
frontend/src/components/MasterOrderUpdat: Admin-only form for updating master order totals (manufactured and dispatched quantities) with validation, live calculated metrics (remaining, finished stock, completion %), and preview of changes before submission.
frontend/src/components/OperationCompari: Renders a bar chart comparing total completed units across different operations (e.g., cutting, welding) using Recharts with gradient styling and responsive layout.
frontend/src/components/OperationWorkloa: Displays a grid of cards showing pending workload for each operation (Cutting, Welding, Assembly, Painting) with progress bars and capacity indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProductionDashbo: Overview dashboard showing production statistics with summary cards (total production, ready for dispatch, pending, under testing) and breakdowns by container type and status.
frontend/src/components/ProductionEntryF: Form for creating new production entries with fields for container type, quantities, shift details, and status; resets on successful submission.
frontend/src/components/ProductionHistor: Displays a detailed table of production history filtered by date range, showing daily production reports with metrics like today's production, total completed, dispatched, and in-hand quantities. Includes admin-only edit functionality via a dialog.

Renders a filterable production history table with container type and status filters, displaying production entries with formatted dates and status badges. Uses skeleton loading states and handles empty data scenarios.
frontend/src/components/ProductionTrendC: Displays a line chart showing daily production trends over time using Recharts, with support for historical opening balance as a baseline point. Includes loading, error, and empty states with auto-refresh indicators.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Modal dialog component for first-time user profile setup, requiring name and department input before allowing access to the application. Prevents dismissal until profile is saved.
frontend/src/components/SummaryCard.tsx: Reusable card component displaying a metric with an icon, title, and optional description/trend, featuring animated number counting and hover effects with gradient styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, creating authenticated or anonymous actors and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for managing user login/logout with AuthClient, including identity persistence, login status tracking, and configurable authentication options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend API interactions including user profiles, production entries, dispatch tracking, daily reports, master orders, and historical opening balances. Includes mutations with toast notifications and query invalidation for cache management.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for a premium industrial dark theme using OKLCH color space. Defines CSS variables for colors, gradients, glass effects, metallic borders, and animations for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/DailyProductionReport: Admin-only page for recording and managing daily production reports. Shows access denied screen for non-admins and displays form and table components for authorized users.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page displaying real-time overview of container manufacturing operations via the ProductionDashboard component.
Page for dispatch tracking that shows entry form only to admins but allows all users to view dispatch history table.
frontend/src/pages/HistoricalOpeningBala: Manages historical opening balance display and initialization. Shows existing balance to all users, but only allows admins to set initial balance if none exists.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Landing page with Internet Identity authentication. Displays branding, system description, and login button with loading states.
frontend/src/pages/OperationWorkloadPage: Page displaying current work-in-hand status across manufacturing operations via the OperationWorkloadView component.
frontend/src/pages/ProductionDashboardLi: Live production dashboard with date filtering, summary statistics, master order progress, production trends, and operation comparison charts. Includes auto-refresh and opening balance display.
frontend/src/pages/ProductionEntryPage.t: Admin-only page for creating new production entries. Shows access denied screen for non-admin users.
frontend/src/pages/ProductionHistoryPage: Displays detailed production history with date range filtering. All users can view, but only admins can edit records.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support and functions to clear sensitive parameters from URLs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a dark-themed industrial SaaS design system with custom OKLCH color palette (navy, electric blue, industrial green), extended utilities for borders, shadows, animations, and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Project state document describing a shipping container manufacturing tracking SaaS application with 17 tracked operations, role-based access control, production dashboard, history tracking, and premium dark industrial UI theme.
